channel.description: Recent content in why on NoterBox

item.title: Why I am building NoterBox
item.description: Hey, what’s up, I am Gabriel - and I am building NoterBox. I have started working on NoterBox to solve a personal problem: I needed a long term secure solution to store and manage my personal data. And I needed to be able to easily capture new data from several sources, as well as search that data. In other words, a PIM for the 21st century. I need to know when exactly I have sent out that certificate for authentication (was it 4 or 6 weeks ago?
